title: LAP: Modern Slavery and Human Trafficking in Latin America (Spanish)
description: Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors Daniela Issa on the subject of the November 2017 issue: "Modern Slavery and Human Trafficking in Latin America."
content:encoded: Alexander Scott, Outreach Coordinator for Latin American Perspectives, interviews special guest editors Daniela Issa on the subject of the November 2017 issue: "Modern Slavery and Human Trafficking in Latin America."
